summary: Video is a way to capture and share moving images. It started with mechanical TVs, then improved with CRT screens, and now we have flat-panel displays. Videos can be high-resolution, have different screen ratios, and show various colors. They can be analog or digital and are shared through radio, tapes, discs, online files, or streaming. This process shows how media production has evolved to deliver visual content to our screens.
title: Video
